# LLM

### LLM

- [https://claude.ai/](https://claude.ai/) Claude (Anthropic)
- [https://openai.com/](https://openai.com/) GPT (OpenAI)
- [https://www.llama.com/](https://www.llama.com/) Llama (Meta)
- [https://grok.com/](https://grok.com/) Grok (xAI)
- [https://www.deepseek.com/en](https://www.deepseek.com/en) DeepSeek (Лян Вэньфэн)
- [https://aws.amazon.com/ru/q/](https://aws.amazon.com/ru/q/) Amazon Q (Amazon)
- [https://gemini.google.com/](https://gemini.google.com/) Gemini (Google)

### Платформы

- [https://ollama.com/](https://ollama.com/) Ollama (платформа, созданная для использования различных языковых моделей, включая Llama)

### UI для LLM

- [https://docs.openwebui.com/](https://docs.openwebui.com/) Open WebUI
- [https://anythingllm.com/](https://anythingllm.com/) AnythingLLM
